custom-skill.name: Custom Skill
custom-skill.description: This is not a real skill.  It exists to be overwritten.
custom-skill.description2: The robot has a skill so specific it cannot be applied to other robots.  This custom skill placeholder thus needs to be overwritten with custom text.

guard-submodule.name: Guard Submodule
guard-submodule.description: Protects the robot from all stat changes
guard-submodule.description2: Protects the robot's stats in battle making any attempts at changing them have no effect.

xtreme-submodule.name: Xtreme Submodule
xtreme-submodule.description: Intensifies all stat changes on the robot
xtreme-submodule.description2: Deregulates the robot's stats in battle making any stat changes to it have an extreme effect.

reverse-submodule.name: Reverse Submodule
reverse-submodule.description: Reverses all stat changes on the robot
reverse-submodule.description2: Regulates the robot's stats in battle and makes any stat changes inflicted on them have an opposite effect.

checkvalve-submodule.name: Checkvalve Submodule
checkvalve-submodule.description: [dynamic] Protects the robot from stat reduction
checkvalve-submodule.description2: Protects the robot's favourite stat in battle making any attempts to reduce it have no effect.

copycat-submodule.name: Copycat Submodule
copycat-submodule.description: The robot copies the target's positive stat changes
copycat-submodule.description2: The robot automatically copies positive stat changes on the opponent at the end of each turn.

boost-submodule.name: Boost Submodule
boost-submodule.description: Increases the robot's stat boost powers
boost-submodule.description2: Increases the effectiveness of stat boosts granted by the robot's abilities to twice their usual power.

break-submodule.name: Break Submodule
break-submodule.description: Increases the robot's stat break powers
break-submodule.description2: Increases the effectiveness of stat breaks inflicted by the robot's abilities to twice their usual power.

tenacity-submodule.name: Tenacity Submodule
tenacity-submodule.description: [dynamic] The robot can inflict elemental damage without resistance
tenacity-submodule.description2: The robot is able to inflict elemental damage on targets without regard to resistances or negative multipliers.  Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

overkill-submodule.name: Overkill Submodule
overkill-submodule.description: Deals extra damage when the target has a weakness
overkill-submodule.description2: The robot puts effort into doing more damage when it knows the target has a weakness to one of its moves.

siphon-submodule.name: Siphon Submodule
siphon-submodule.description: Steals weapon energy from the target when dealing damage
siphon-submodule.description2: The robot steals a bit of weapon energy from the target whenever they successfully deal damage using an ability.

target-submodule.name: Target Submodule
target-submodule.description2: Improves the robot's targeting capabilities allowing them to reach even benched robots with most abilities.

charge-submodule.name: Charge Submodule
charge-submodule.description2: Improves the robot's charging capabilities allowing them to skip the charging phase of some abilities.

persist-submodule.name: Persist Submodule
persist-submodule.description: Survives one-hit knockouts with a sliver of energy remaining
persist-submodule.description2: If the robot has full energy and is hit with an ability that should knock it out, it will instead endure with a sliver of health remaining.

spreader-submodule.name: Spreader Submodule
spreader-submodule.description: Generates multiple field hazards at a time
spreader-submodule.description2: Allows the robot to generate multiple field hazards at once when using abilities.

construction-submodule.name: Construction Submodule
construction-submodule.description: Protects itself with Super Blocks at the end of each turn
construction-submodule.description2: The robot places a Super Block at its current position at the end of any turn it is not already protected by one.

bulwark-submodule.name: Bulwark Submodule
bulwark-submodule.description: The robot protects benched allies from being targeted
bulwark-submodule.description2: The robot's defensive prowess protects benched allies from being targeted by the opponent's abilities.

saboteur-submodule.name: Saboteur Submodule
saboteur-submodule.description: Prevents the use of recovery moves on the field
saboteur-submodule.description2: The robot nullifies the effects of all life and weapon energy recovery moves so long as it remains on the field.

metronome-submodule.name: Metronome Submodule
metronome-submodule.description: Prevents the use of priority moves on the field
metronome-submodule.description2: The robot's adept timekeeping skills prevent priority moves from working as long as they're still on the field.

hyperscan-submodule.name: Hyperscan Submodule
hyperscan-submodule.description: Reveals the target's abilities when scanning
hyperscan-submodule.description2: Improves the robot's scanning capabilities allowing them to see even the target's abilities when scanning.

nightmare-submodule.name: Nightmare Submodule
nightmare-submodule.description: Afflicts the active target with a weakness when face-to-face
nightmare-submodule.description2: The robot afflicts the active target with a weakness to its own core type when standing face-to-face.

transport-submodule.name: Transport Submodule
transport-submodule.description: Allows other robots to switch freely when this one's on the bench
transport-submodule.description2: The robot allows teammates to switch freely to and from active position but only when this robot is on the bench.

wellspring-submodule.name: Wellspring Submodule
wellspring-submodule.description: Reduces the cost of abilities matching the user's core to only one unit
wellspring-submodule.description2: The robot's wellspring of elemental energy reduces the cost of abilities matching their own core type for everyone on the team.

anti-attack-submodule.name: Anti-Attack Submodule
anti-attack-submodule.description: The robot nullifies attack stat changes at the end of each turn
anti-attack-submodule.description2: The robot uses its expert skills to nullify any attack stat changes on other robots at the end of each turn.

anti-defense-submodule.name: Anti-Defense Submodule
anti-defense-submodule.description: The robot nullifies defense stat changes at the end of each turn
anti-defense-submodule.description2: The robot uses its expert skills to nullify any defense stat changes on other robots at the end of each turn.

anti-speed-submodule.name: Anti-Speed Submodule
anti-speed-submodule.description: The robot nullifies speed stat changes at the end of each turn
anti-speed-submodule.description2: The robot uses its expert skills to nullify any speed stat changes on other robots at the end of each turn.

anti-guard-submodule.name: Anti-Guard Submodule
anti-guard-submodule.description: The robot disables opposing core shield at the start of each turn
anti-guard-submodule.description2: The robot disarms and removes opposing core shields at the start of each turn and delays their regeneration.

disentangle-submodule.name: Disentangle Submodule
disentangle-submodule.description: The robot frees itself of field hazards at the end of each turn
disentangle-submodule.description2: The robot uses its skills to remove any negative field hazards affecting it at the end of each turn.

disarmament-submodule.name: Disarmament Submodule
disarmament-submodule.description: The robot disables hazardous explosives at the end of the turn
disarmament-submodule.description2: The robot employs expert knowledge of munitions to disarm any nearby explosives at the end of each turn.

sanitation-submodule.name: Sanitation Submodule
sanitation-submodule.description: The robot neutralizes hazardous material at the end of the turn
sanitation-submodule.description2: The robot employs expert sanitization techniques to clean up any hazardous materials at the end of each turn.

attack-assist-submodule.name: Attack-Assist Submodule
attack-assist-submodule.description: Boosts attack from the bench at the end of each turn
attack-assist-submodule.description2: This robot boosts the active robot's attack stat at the end of each turn so long as it remains on the bench.

defense-assist-submodule.name: Defense-Assist Submodule
defense-assist-submodule.description: Boosts defense from the bench at the end of each turn
defense-assist-submodule.description2: This robot boosts the active robot's defense stat at the end of each turn so long as it remains on the bench.

speed-assist-submodule.name: Speed-Assist Submodule
speed-assist-submodule.description: Boosts speed from the bench at the end of each turn
speed-assist-submodule.description2: This robot boosts the active robot's speed stat at the end of each turn so long as it remains on the bench.

medic-submodule.name: Medic Submodule
medic-submodule.description: Heals allies from the bench at the end of each turn
medic-submodule.description2: The robot restores lost health to wounded robots at the end of each turn so long as it remains on the bench.

armorer-submodule.name: Armorer Submodule
armorer-submodule.description: Restores depleted weapons from the bench at the end of each turn
armorer-submodule.description2: The robot fully restores depleted weapon energies at the end of each turn so long as it remains on the bench.

recycler-submodule.name: Recycler Submodule
recycler-submodule.description: Allows the use of consumable items multiple times
recycler-submodule.description2: The robot is able to recycle previously consumed items into new forms for itself and allies before each turn.

inventory-submodule.name: Inventory Submodule
inventory-submodule.description: [dynamic] Gives one ally a consumable item at end-of-turn phase
inventory-submodule.description2: The robot gives an ally-in-need a consumable item at the end of the turn.  The exact item depends on required parameters that must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

drowsing-submodule.name: Drowsing Submodule
drowsing-submodule.description: Slows down to rest and recover lost health at the end of each turn
drowsing-submodule.description2: The robot takes a break in the middle of battle to recover lost health but loses some speed in doing so.

stat-boost-at-battle-start.name: Stat Boost at Battle-Start
stat-boost-at-battle-start.description: [dynamic] Boosts a stat at battle-start phase
stat-boost-at-battle-start.description2: The robot's stat is automatically boosted at the start of battle, possibly when certain conditions are met.  Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

stat-boost-at-end-of-turn.name: Stat Boost at End-of-Turn
stat-boost-at-end-of-turn.description: [dynamic] Boosts a stat at end-of-turn phase
stat-boost-at-end-of-turn.description2: The robot's stat is automatically boosted at the end of the turn, possibly when certain conditions are met, and possibly only once.  Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

stat-boost-on-knockout.name: Stat Boost on Knockout
stat-boost-on-knockout.description: [dynamic] Boosts a stat when disabling a target
stat-boost-on-knockout.description2: The robot's stat is automatically boosted after a successfull knockout, possibly when certain conditions are met, and possibly only once.  Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

stat-boost-on-robots-nearby.name: Stat Boost on Robots Nearby
stat-boost-on-robots-nearby.description: [dynamic] The robot's stat is boosted when certain robots are nearby
stat-boost-on-robots-nearby.description2: The robot's preferred stat is boosted by the presence of specific robots on the field. Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

stat-boost-on-cores-nearby.name: Stat Boost on Cores Nearby
stat-boost-on-cores-nearby.description: [dynamic] The robot's stat is boosted when core type is nearby
stat-boost-on-cores-nearby.description2: The robot's preferred stat is boosted by the presence of other robots on the field with a specific core types. Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

field-boost-at-battle-start.name: Field Boost at Battle-Start
field-boost-at-battle-start.description: [dynamic] Boosts a field multiplier at battle-start phase
field-boost-at-battle-start.description2: The robot automatically boosts a field multiplier at the start of battle, possibly when certain conditions are met.  Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

field-boost-at-end-of-turn.name: Field Boost at End-of-Turn
field-boost-at-end-of-turn.description: [dynamic] Boosts a field multiplier at end-of-turn phase
field-boost-at-end-of-turn.description2: The robot automatically boosts a field multiplier at the end of the turn, possibly when certain conditions are met, and possibly only once. Required parameters must be set on the robot to use this skill (see the "Functions" tab for details) and the short/long description must be customized.

find-item-at-end-of-turn.name: Find Item at End-of-Turn
find-item-at-end-of-turn.description: [dynamic] Randomly finds items at end-of-turn phase
find-item-at-end-of-turn.description2: The robot may randomly find an item at the end of the turn given provided parameters.  Found items are automatically added to the player's inventory.  Does not trigger in challenges, endless mode, or player battles.

weapon-subsaver.name: Weapon Subsaver
weapon-subsaver.description: Reduces weapon energy used by abilities
weapon-subsaver.description2: Reduces the weapon energy consumed by the robot when using elemental abilities by up to half.

weapon-subcharger.name: Weapon Subcharger
weapon-subcharger.description: Restores extra weapon energy at the end of each turn
weapon-subcharger.description2: The robot restores depleted weapon energy by up to half at the end of each turn in battle.

weapon-memory.name: Weapon Memory
weapon-memory.description: Adapts weaknesses to match upcoming abilities
weapon-memory.description2: The robot adapts its weaknesses before using an ability to match those of the ability's original owner.

neutral-subshield.name: Neutral Subshield
neutral-subshield.description: Protects the robot from Neutral type damage
neutral-subshield.description2: The robot's armour completely protects it from Neutral type attack damage.

elemental-subshield.name: Elemental Subshield
elemental-subshield.description: Protects the robot from elemental damage
elemental-subshield.description2: The robot's armour completely protects it from elemental attack damage.

cutter-subcore.name: Cutter Subcore
cutter-subcore.description: Allows native use of Cutter-type abilities
cutter-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Cutter-type abilities as if they were a Cutter-core.

impact-subcore.name: Impact Subcore
impact-subcore.description: Allows native use of Impact-type abilities
impact-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Impact-type abilities as if they were an Impact-core.

freeze-subcore.name: Freeze Subcore
freeze-subcore.description: Allows native use of Freeze-type abilities
freeze-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Freeze-type abilities as if they were a Freeze-core.

explode-subcore.name: Explode Subcore
explode-subcore.description: Allows native use of Explode-type abilities
explode-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Explode-type abilities as if they were an Explode-core.

flame-subcore.name: Flame Subcore
flame-subcore.description: Allows native use of Flame-type abilities
flame-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Flame-type abilities as if they were a Flame-core.

electric-subcore.name: Electric Subcore
electric-subcore.description: Allows native use of Electric-type abilities
electric-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Electric-type abilities as if they were an Electric-core.

time-subcore.name: Time Subcore
time-subcore.description: Allows native use of Time-type abilities
time-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Time-type abilities as if they were a Time-core.

earth-subcore.name: Earth Subcore
earth-subcore.description: Allows native use of Earth-type abilities
earth-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Earth-type abilities as if they were an Earth-core.

wind-subcore.name: Wind Subcore
wind-subcore.description: Allows native use of Wind-type abilities
wind-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Wind-type abilities as if they were a Wind-core.

water-subcore.name: Water Subcore
water-subcore.description: Allows native use of Water-type abilities
water-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Water-type abilities as if they were a Water-core.

swift-subcore.name: Swift Subcore
swift-subcore.description: Allows native use of Swift-type abilities
swift-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Swift-type abilities as if they were a Swift-core.

nature-subcore.name: Nature Subcore
nature-subcore.description: Allows native use of Nature-type abilities
nature-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Nature-type abilities as if they were a Nature-core.

missile-subcore.name: Missile Subcore
missile-subcore.description: Allows native use of Missile-type abilities
missile-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Missile-type abilities as if they were a Missile-core.

crystal-subcore.name: Crystal Subcore
crystal-subcore.description: Allows native use of Crystal-type abilities
crystal-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Crystal-type abilities as if they were a Crystal-core.

shadow-subcore.name: Shadow Subcore
shadow-subcore.description: Allows native use of Shadow-type abilities
shadow-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Shadow-type abilities as if they were a Shadow-core.

space-subcore.name: Space Subcore
space-subcore.description: Allows native use of Space-type abilities
space-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Space-type abilities as if they were a Space-core.

shield-subcore.name: Shield Subcore
shield-subcore.description: Allows native use of Shield-type abilities
shield-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Shield-type abilities as if they were a Shield-core.

laser-subcore.name: Laser Subcore
laser-subcore.description: Allows native use of Laser-type abilities
laser-subcore.description2: Allows the robot to equip and use Laser-type abilities as if they were a Laser-core.
